description.main_subject: Microsoft Teams meeting with a shared whiteboard on Convex Optimization
description.detailed_description: A screenshot of a Microsoft Teams meeting displays a shared whiteboard filled with handwritten notes and diagrams related to 'Convex Optimization.' Concepts like 'Convex Set' and 'Affine Combination' are explained with mathematical formulas and visual representations, marked with red checkmarks and crosses. The right panel shows a list of meeting participants, indicating an active educational or collaborative session.
